instrument.name: Banjo (4 Strings) - Chicago
instrument.description:
aka: Chicago Tuning Origin: USA
Note: tuned like the top four strings of a guitar

instrument.name: Bass Guitar (6 Strings) - High B
instrument.description: Note: matches the first five strings of the guitar standard tuning (but one octave lower)

instrument.name: Bass Guitar (6 Strings) - Guitar
instrument.description: Note: matches the guitar standard tuning but one octave lower

instrument.name: Bouzouki (3x2 Strings)
instrument.description: aka: Bouzoukia, Trichordo Bouzouki Origin: Greece

instrument.name: Bouzouki (4x2 Strings)
instrument.description: aka: Bouzoukia, Tetrachordo Bouzouki Origin: Greece

instrument.name: Fiddle (4 Strings) - Cross
instrument.description: aka: Violin; High Bass, High Counter or High Tenor Tuning

instrument.name: Fiddle (4 Strings) - Calico
instrument.description: aka: Violin; Black Mountain or Rag Tuning

instrument.name: Double Bass (4 Strings) - F#
instrument.description:
aka: Contrabass Scale length [mm]: 1/16=700, 1/10=750, 1/8=800, 1/4=900, 1/2=1000, 3/4=1050, 7/8=1060
Note: standard tuning ,E-,A-D-G tuned a whole tone higher, usually used for classical solo play = solo tuning

instrument.name: Double Bass (4 Strings) - Standard E
instrument.description:
aka: Contrabass Scale length [mm]: 1/16=700, 1/10=750, 1/8=800, 1/4=900, 1/2=1000, 3/4=1050, 7/8=1060
Note: standard, regular or orchestral tuning

instrument.name: Mandolin (4x2 Strings) - Piccolo
instrument.description: aka: Bright Tone Mandolin, Brilliant Tone Mandolin, Mandolita, Sopranino Mandolin Origin: Italy

instrument.name: Mandola (4x2 Strings) - Octave
instrument.description: aka: Octave Mandola, Octave Mandolin Origin: Italy

instrument.name: Mandola (4x2 Strings) - Tenor
instrument.description: aka: Mandola, Tenor Mandola, Tenor Mandolin Origin: Italy

instrument.name: Cavaquinho (4 Strings) - Standard
instrument.description: aka: Cavaco, Manchete, Machimbo Origin: Portugal

instrument.name: Charango (4x2 Strings)
instrument.description: aka: Quirquincho, Mulita, Tatu, Kirki Origin: Andes (Bolivia, Peru, Argentina, Chile, Ecuador)

instrument.name: Charango (5x2 Strings) - Standard
instrument.description: aka: Quirquincho, Mulita, Tatu, Kirki Origin: Andes (Bolivia, Peru, Argentina, Chile, Ecuador)

instrument.name: Cuatro Puertorriqueno (5x2 Strings)
instrument.description: aka: Puerto Rican Cuatro, Cuatro Aviolinado, Cuatro Moderno Origin: Puerto Rico

instrument.name: Bandurria (6x2 Strings) - Standard
instrument.description: Note: Although called Standard most bandurria players use the tunings Spanish and Philippine.

instrument.name: Ukulele (4 Strings) - Tenor C6
instrument.description: aka: Uke, Tenor Uke Origin: Hawaii
